golden_diagnosis: POEMS 综合征/POEMS syndrome/POEMS syndrome,POEMS 综合征/POEMS syndrome/POEMS syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Nephrolithiasis with renal disease
2. Hypothyroidism
3. Ascites with underlying cardiac and pulmonary involvement
4. Sleep disturbance with underlying systemic disease
5. Follicular hyperplasia with thyroid disease
6. Exertional dyspnea with underlying cardiac disease
7. Hemuria with underlying renal disease
8. Chronic gastritis with underlying systemic disease
9. Pericardial effusion with underlying cardiac disease
10. Monoclonal elevation of circulating IgA with underlying systemic disease
